data.actual_result: It displays permissions and invites from FIRST edited channel after launching Discord, even from channel in other server
data.expected_result: It is supposed to show permissions and invites for the second channel, not for the first opened previously.
data.short_description: Permissions viewer isn't refreshing when displaying to other channel
data.steps_to_repro: - open editing one channel - navigate to "Permissions tab" - close the viewer - open editing other channel - navigate to permissions tab - you can see permissions configured for the first channel (it "works" with the invites too)
